overview: An interview with a group of people shot in October 1969, some of whom were involved in The Weathermenâ€™s "Days of Rage" actions. As those present recount the significance of the actions, and the possible ramifications on the movement as a whole, some critics voice serious complaints. In addition to videotaping these discussions, the Videofreex also weigh in on matters.
title: Chicago Travelogue: The Weathermen
